Hi, I'm Maxime
A freelance JavaScript developer based in Belgium

I play well with others www.befreelance.be

I specialise in JavaScript application, startup project, growth hacking and creative coding.

I have experience with contemporary frontend technologies such as AngularJS, Browserify and Bash/NPM/Gulp/Grunt for project automation. Also experienced with Node.js-based web apps, REST API development and MVPs creation with Meteor.

I have Agile experience and I'm comfortable working in teams of all sizes at all stages of the project lifecycle from planning through to delivery.

About me

I'm a 25 year old web developer living in Belgium (near Couvin). I create web applications for my company: ranqed. I like blogging, sushi, beer, kendo and doing crafting good stuff.

I'm currently available for any kind of project.
